subject: p13979643
Findings: There has been interval placement of a nasogastric tube with its side port below the GE junction. The left-sided PICC tip terminates at the mid to upper SVC. Otherwise, the heart size is unchanged, and there is bibasilar atelectasis. No large pleural effusion or pneumothorax is present.
